verses.text: \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*! \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* \w Your|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w worked|strong="H6213"\w* \w wonders|strong="H6382"\w*— \w plans|strong="H6098"\w* formed \w long|strong="H7350"\w* \w ago|strong="H7350"\w*— \w in|strong="H3068"\w* perfect faithfulness.

\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1129"\w* \w made|strong="H7760"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w heap|strong="H1530"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* rubble, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w town|strong="H7151"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w ruin|strong="H4654"\w*. \w The|strong="H3588"\w* \w fortress|strong="H7151"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w* \w is|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H3808"\w*; \w it|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w rebuilt|strong="H1129"\w*.

\w Therefore|strong="H3651"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w strong|strong="H5794"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w honor|strong="H3513"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*. \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w cities|strong="H7151"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w ruthless|strong="H6184"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w revere|strong="H3372"\w* \w You|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w poor|strong="H1800"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w stronghold|strong="H4581"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w needy|strong="H1800"\w* \w in|strong="H1961"\w* \w distress|strong="H6862"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w refuge|strong="H4268"\w* \w from|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w storm|strong="H2230"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w from|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w heat|strong="H2721"\w*. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w breath|strong="H7307"\w* \w of|strong="H7307"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ruthless|strong="H6184"\w* \w is|strong="H7307"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* rain \w against|strong="H7307"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*,

\w like|strong="H6738"\w* \w heat|strong="H2721"\w* \w in|strong="H6030"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dry|strong="H2721"\w* land. \w You|strong="H2114"\w* \w subdue|strong="H3665"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w uproar|strong="H7588"\w* \w of|strong="H7588"\w* \w foreigners|strong="H2114"\w*. \w As|strong="H5645"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w shade|strong="H6738"\w* \w of|strong="H7588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w* cools \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w heat|strong="H2721"\w*, \w so|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w song|strong="H2158"\w* \w of|strong="H7588"\w* \w the|strong="H6030"\w* \w ruthless|strong="H6184"\w* \w is|strong="H6738"\w* silenced.

\w On|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hosts|strong="H6635"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w prepare|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w banquet|strong="H4960"\w* \w for|strong="H6213"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w feast|strong="H4960"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w aged|strong="H8105"\w* \w wine|strong="H8105"\w*, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w choice|strong="H8081"\w* meat, \w of|strong="H3068"\w* finely \w aged|strong="H8105"\w* \w wine|strong="H8105"\w*.

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w* \w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H1471"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* shroud \w that|strong="H5971"\w* enfolds \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* sheet \w that|strong="H5971"\w* covers \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*;

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w swallow|strong="H1104"\w* \w up|strong="H1104"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w* \w forever|strong="H5331"\w*.\f + \fr 25:8 \ft Or He will swallow up death in victory; cited in 1 Corinthians 15:54\f* \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w wipe|strong="H4229"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tears|strong="H1832"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \f + \fr 25:8 \ft Cited in Revelation 7:17 and Revelation 21:4\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w remove|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w disgrace|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w whole|strong="H3605"\w* earth. For the LORD has spoken.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* said, “\w Surely|strong="H2009"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*; \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w Him|strong="H1931"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w saved|strong="H3467"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w*. \w This|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* whom \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w waited|strong="H6960"\w*. \w Let|strong="H8055"\w* \w us|strong="H3117"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*.”

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w rest|strong="H5117"\w* \w on|strong="H5117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*. \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w Moab|strong="H4124"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w trampled|strong="H1758"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w straw|strong="H4963"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w trodden|strong="H1758"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* dung \w pile|strong="H4087"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3027"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w out|strong="H6566"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* \w it|strong="H6566"\w*, \w as|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w swimmer|strong="H7811"\w* \w spreads|strong="H6566"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w arms|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w swim|strong="H7811"\w*. \w His|strong="H3027"\w* \w pride|strong="H1346"\w* \w will|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H8213"\w* \w low|strong="H8213"\w*, \w despite|strong="H5973"\w* \f + \fr 25:11 \ft Or along with\f* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* skill \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5704"\w* high-walled \w fortress|strong="H4013"\w* \w will|strong="H5704"\w* be \w brought|strong="H5060"\w* \w down|strong="H7817"\w*, \w cast|strong="H5060"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w ground|strong="H6083"\w*, \w into|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*.
